entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as sitting in the Great Hall and eating between Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, also a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as sitting next to Harry in the Great Hall.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend, also a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as sitting next to Ron and Harry in the Great Hall.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who had a shouting match with Harry. The news of this incident has traveled fast around the school.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who was murdered. Harry claims to have seen him being killed.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as Voldemort. He is mentioned as someone that Harry dueled with.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: A large hall at Hogwarts where students eat their meals.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school attended by Harry and his friends.

relationships.description: Harry had a shouting match with Umbridge, which has become the talk of the school.
Harry claims to have seen Cedric Diggory being murdered.
Harry dueled with You-Know-Who, also known as Voldemort.
Ron sat next to Harry in the Great Hall.
Hermione sat next to Ron and Harry in the Great Hall.
The Great Hall is located within Hogwarts.
